api/KS.ConsoleBase.ConsoleChecker.html.title: Class ConsoleChecker | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/KS.ConsoleBase.ConsoleChecker.html.keywords: Class ConsoleChecker Console sanity checking module Inheritance object ConsoleChecker Namespace: KS.ConsoleBase Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public static class ConsoleChecker Methods | Edit this page View Source CheckConsole() Checks the running console for sanity, like the incompatible consoles, insane console types, etc. The severity of the checks can be described in two categories: Error: We'll throw KernelException with type InsaneConsoleDetected when we detect that the console is not conforming to the standards. Warning: We'll just issue a warning in yellow text using the plain 16-color writer when we detect that the console is not supporting optional features, like 256-colors. Declaration public static void CheckConsole() | Edit this page View Source IsConsole256Colors() Does the console support 256 colors? Declaration public static bool IsConsole256Colors() Returns Type Description bool

api/KS.Kernel.Configuration.Settings.Set.title: Enum SettingsKeyType | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/KS.Kernel.Configuration.Settings.Set.keywords: Enum SettingsKeyType Key type for settings entry Namespace: KS.Kernel.Configuration.Settings Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum SettingsKeyType Fields Name Description SBoolean The value is of bool SChar The value is of char and only accepts one character. SColor The value is of Color and comes from the color wheel SDouble The value is of double SFiglet The value is a Figlet font name that allows Settings to use the Figlet font selector. SInt The value is of int SIntSlider The value is of int, but has a slider which has a minimum and maximum value. Useful for numbers which are limited. SList The value is of IEnumerable<T>, like List<T> SPreset The value is a shell preset defined using IPromptPreset in CurrentPresets SSelection The value is of the selection, which can either come from enums, or from IEnumerable<T>, like List<T> SString The value is of string SUnknown Unknown type

api/KS.Kernel.Events.EventType.html.keywords: Enum EventType Kernel event type Namespace: KS.Kernel.Events Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum EventType Fields Name Description ArgumentsInjected Fired when the arguments are injected ColorReset Fired when the colors are reset ColorSet Fired when a color is set ColorSetError Fired when a color is not set due to an error CommandError Fired on command error ConfigRead Fired when config is read ConfigReadError Fired on config read error ConfigSaveError Fired on config save error ConfigSaved Fired when config is saved ContKernelError Fired on continuable kernel error CurrentDirectoryChanged Fired when the current diectory is changed DirectoryCopied Fired when a new folder is copied DirectoryCreated Fired when a new folder is created DirectoryMoved Fired when a new folder is moved DirectoryRemoved Fired when a new folder is removed FTPPostDownload Fired after an FTP file is transferred locally (download) FTPPostUpload Fired after an FTP file is transferred remotely (upload) FTPPreDownload Fired before an FTP file is transferred locally (download) FTPPreUpload Fired before an FTP file is transferred remotely (upload) FileAttributeAdded Fired when a file attribute is added FileAttributeRemoved Fired when a file attribute is removed FileCopied Fired when a new file is copied FileCreated Fired when a new file is created FileMoved Fired when a new file is moved FileRemoved Fired when a new file is removed GarbageCollected Fired after garbage collection HardwareProbed Fired when the hardware is probed HardwareProbing Fired when the hardware is probing KernelError Fired on kernel error KernelStarted When the kernel is started LanguageInstallError Fired on language install error LanguageInstalled Fired on language installed LanguageUninstallError Fired on language uninstall error LanguageUninstalled Fired on language uninstalled LanguagesInstallError Fired on languages install error LanguagesInstalled Fired on languages installed LanguagesUninstallError Fired on languages uninstall error LanguagesUninstalled Fired on languages uninstalled LoginError Fired on login error ModFinalizationFailed Fired when the mod failed to finalize ModFinalized Fired when the mod is finalized ModParseError Fired when the mod failed to parse ModParsed Fired when the mod is parsed NotificationDismissed Fired on notification being dismissed NotificationReceived Fired on notification being received NotificationSent Fired on notification being sent NotificationsReceived Fired on notifications being received NotificationsSent Fired on notifications being sent PlaceholderParseError Fired when parsing placeholders failed PlaceholderParsed Fired after parsing placeholders PlaceholderParsing Fired while the placeholders are being parsed PostExecuteCommand Fired after command execution PostExecuteModCommand Fired after mod command execution PostLogin Fired after login PostReboot Fired after reboot PostReloadConfig Fired after config reload PostShowScreensaver Fired on screensaver end PostShutdown Fired after shutdown PostUnlock Fired after unlocking PreExecuteCommand Fired before command execution PreExecuteModCommand Fired before mod command execution PreLogin Fired before login PreReboot Fired before reboot PreReloadConfig Fired before config reload PreShowScreensaver Fired on screensaver start PreShutdown Fired before shutdown PreUnlock Fired before unlocking ProcessError Fired on process error RPCCommandError Fired on RPC command error RPCCommandReceived RPC command is received RPCCommandSent RPC command is sent RemoteDebugCommandError Fired on remote debug command error RemoteDebugConnectionAccepted A connection is accepted RemoteDebugConnectionDisconnected A connection is disconnected RemoteDebugExecuteCommand Fired on remote debug command execution ResizeDetected Fired on console resize SFTPDownloadError Fired on SFTP download error SFTPPostDownload Fired after an SFTP file is downloaded SFTPPostUpload Fired after an SFTP file is uploaded SFTPPreDownload Fired before an SFTP file is downloaded SFTPPreUpload Fired before an SFTP file is uploaded SFTPUploadError Fired on SFTP upload error SSHCommandError Fired on SSH command error SSHConnected Connected to SSH SSHDisconnected Disconnected from SSH SSHError Fired on SSH error SSHPostExecuteCommand Fired after SSH command execution SSHPreExecuteCommand Fired before SSH command execution ShellInitialized When the shell is initialized StartKernel When the kernel starts ThemeSet Fired when a theme is set ThemeSetError Fired when a theme is not set due to an error ThemeStudioExit Fired when the theme studio is exited ThemeStudioStarted Fired when the theme studio is started UESHError Fired on UESH error UESHPostExecute Fired after UESH script execution UESHPreExecute Fired before UESH script execution UserAdded Fired when a new user arrived UserPasswordChanged Fired when a user changed their password UserRemoved Fired when a user is removed UsernameChanged Fired when a user changed their name

api/KS.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelException.title: Enum KernelExceptionType | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/KS.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelException.keywords: Enum KernelExceptionType Kernel exception types Namespace: KS.Kernel.Exceptions Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum KernelExceptionType Fields Name Description AddonManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the kernel addon management. AliasAlreadyExists The specified alias already exists. Make sure that you select a different alias. AliasInvalidOperation The alias system encountered an invalid operation trying to process your request. AliasNoSuchAlias The specified alias isn't found. AliasNoSuchCommand The specified command isn't found to alias to. AliasNoSuchType The specified alias type isn't found. Archive An invalid archive operation is being performed. AssertionFailure An assertion failure has been detected in the kernel! This is most likely a bug in the kernel module that should be fixed on our end. Calendar An error occurred in the calendar manager. Color An error occurred while trying to process the color request. Common mistakes include specifying the wrong color specifier. CommandManager A general command manager error occurred. Check to make sure that you've written the command or the shell type correctly. Config A kernel configuration error occurred. Console The console operation failed to perform the required task. ConsoleReadTimeout User didn't provide any input in a timely fashion. Contacts A contacts manager error occurred when trying to perform the requested operation. Make sure that the contact file exists in the correct folder and that it's a valid vCard 2.1, 3.0, or 4.0 contact file. CustomSettings An error occurred in the custom settings manager for users. Debug An invalid debugging operation is being performed. DriverHandler The driver handler failed to perform this action because you might have supplied the parameters wrong. If you're sure that they're specified correctly, make sure that you've provided the right driver name and type. Encoding Encoding has failed. Check to make sure that your encoding driver works correctly and fix any problems if found, then try again. Encryption An invalid encryption operation is being performed. EventManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the kernel event management. FTPFilesystem A general FTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. FTPNetwork A general FTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. FTPShell A general FTP shell error occurred. Filesystem A general filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. GroupManagement A group management error occurred. HTTPNetwork A general HTTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. HTTPShell A general HTTP shell error occurred. Hardware Hardware component manager failed. HexEditor An invalid hex editor operation is being performed. Hostname Hostname error. InsaneConsoleDetected Insane console has been detected. Nitrocid KS can't continue running, because your console is incompatible with our requirements. InteractiveTui An error occurred in the Interactive TUI implementation. InvalidFeed Invalid RSS feed. InvalidFeedLink Invalid RSS feed link. InvalidFeedType Invalid RSS feed type. InvalidHash Invalid hash sum. Check to make sure that you copied and pasted the hash sum correctly. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded and that it works as expected. InvalidHashAlgorithm Invalid hash algorithm. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded. InvalidKernelPath Invalid kernel path. InvalidManpage Invalid manual page. Check to make sure that the mod containing the valid manual pages is loaded. InvalidMod Invalid mod. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. InvalidPath Invalid filesystem path. Check to make sure that it's written correctly. InvalidPlaceholder Invalid placeholder. Consult the kernel documentation for more information. InvalidPlaceholderAction Invalid placeholder action. Consult the kernel documentation for more information. Journaling The kernel journaling operation failed to perform the required task. JsonEditor An invalid JSON editor operation is being performed. LanguageInstall The custom language failed to install. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageManagement There was an error in the language management. LanguageParse The custom language failed to load. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageUninstall The custom language failed to uninstall. LocaleGen Locale generator tool returned an error while trying to generate JSON files for languages. LoginHandler Login handler failed. Please ensure that it's registered properly and that it does its job as expected. MOTD An error occurred trying to read or set the message of the day. Mail The mail system encountered an error. ModInstall The mod failed to install. Check to make sure that it's a valid mod file. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. ModManagement There was an error in the mod management. ModManual An error occurred in the mod manual parser. Please ensure that your manual file is valid and that the mod is started. ModNoParts The mod contains no parts. Consult with the mod vendor for a new copy. ModUninstall The mod uninstallation has failed. Network A general network error occurred. Should you be trying to connect to a remote end, make sure that you're connected to the Internet or to your local network. NetworkConnection An error occurred in the network connection manager. NetworkOffline Your network needs to be online before being able to perform operations related to networking. Connect your network adapter and try again. NoSuchDriver Driver doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the driver name correctly, and that the driver is registered properly. NoSuchEvent There is no event by this name. NoSuchGroup Group doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the group name correctly. NoSuchLanguage There is no language by this name. NoSuchMailDirectory There is no mail directory by this name. NoSuchMod There is no mod by this name. NoSuchReflectionProperty There is no reflection property by this name. NoSuchReflectionVariable There is no reflection variable by this name. NoSuchScreensaver There is no screensaver by this name. NoSuchShellPreset There is no shell preset by this name. NoSuchTheme There is no theme by this name. NoSuchUser User doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the user correctly. NotImplementedYet This function or feature is not implemented yet. NoteManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the note management. NotificationManagement There was an error in the notification management. NullUsers There are zero users in the entire kernel. We've reached an extremely rare situation. The kernel can't continue. OldModDetected When the kernel tried to load the specified mod, it requested loading "Kernel Simulator". Since the main application is renamed to Nitrocid KS, this mod can't be run safely. We advice you to upgrade the mod. PermissionDenied Permission denied trying to perform an operation. PermissionManagement An error occurred trying to manage permissions PrivacyConsent Invalid privacy consent operation. Please make sure that the consent is correct and try again. ProgressHandler The progress handler has failed to perform the requested operation. RSSNetwork The RSS network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. RSSShell The RSS shell error occurred. Reflection There was an error in the reflection system. RegularExpression A regular expression error happened while the text is being processed. Check your regular expression syntax and try again. If the time-out occurred, ensure that you don't recurse too much (don't be greedy). RemoteDebugDeviceAlreadyExists The remote debug device already exists. RemoteDebugDeviceNotFound The remote debug device is not found. Check to make sure that you've written an IP address of the device right. RemoteDebugDeviceOperation The remote debug device operation failed. RemoteProcedure An operation was attempted on the remote procedure system that is invalid. SFTPFilesystem A general SFTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. SFTPNetwork A general SFTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. SFTPShell A general SFTP shell error occurred. ScreensaverManagement The screensaver management error occurred during the operation. ShellOperation An invalid shell operation is being attempted. Splash Splash manager has failed to perform your requested operation. Please check the splash name and try again. SqlEditor An invalid SQL editor operation is being performed. Text Text tools failed to process your request. TextEditor An invalid text editor operation is being performed. ThemeManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for theme management. ThreadNotReadyYet The thread is not ready yet. The user code might have forgotten to regenerate the kernel thread after stopping it manually. ThreadOperation A thread operation is invalid in the current state. Refer to the additional message the kernel thread manager gave you for additional information. TimeDate An error occurred in the time and date module. Check to make sure that you've specified the time and the date correctly, and that the time zone exists. UESHConditionParse Condition parsing failed. Please check your syntax to meet the operator's expected design. UESHConditional A UESH condition system failed while performing the requested operation. See the error message below for more details. UESHScript An error occurred while trying to parse the UESH script file. Check your script file for errors and correct them. Unknown Unknown kernel error. UnsupportedConsole An unsupported console has been detected. UserCreation A user creation error occurred. UserManagement A user management error occurred.

RedirectionSupported Redirection is supported, meaning that all the output to the commands can be redirected to a file. SettingVariable The command is setting a variable. Strict The command is strict, meaning that it's only available for administrators. Wrappable This command is wrappable to pages.

index.html.title: What is Nitrocid KS? | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
index.html.keywords: What is Nitrocid KS? Nitrocid KS is an application which simulates our future-planned kernel as we've imagined it. It has all the usual applications, including filesystem manipulation, kernel mods, basic scripting, and many more awesome features. What is this web page? This webpage is not a wiki for the general use of Nitrocid KS; it's an API documentation for mod developers to be used as reference. It constantly gets updated as we push the updates to the main and servicing versions of Nitrocid KS. If you still intend to use a documentation specific to your preferred version of KS, you may refer to the releases page of the project and download the attached 0.0.x.y-doc.rar file. To get started using the documentation, select API Documentation from the top menu and select a namespace to get a clear overview of the API that Nitrocid KS provides. Feedback If you wish to leave feedback to us about this API reference website, use the issue tracker of the project. If you wish to contribute to the documentation of the API, go to the Nitrocid KS source code and make your improvements there on a draft Pull Request; we don't support override files that are made by clicking on Improve this doc. Any meaningful contributions are welcome. Copyright (c) 2018 - 2023 Aptivi. All rights reserved.
